name: Multi Turret Academy
description:
Welcome, comrade Commander!

Multi Turret Academy is a top-down tank action game with roguelike elements. Select your vehicle from a growing list of historical models, then equip dozens of weapons and upgrades to lead your local tank club to victory!

The Choice is Yours

A growing selection of WWII tanks awaits, as you decide how to achieve victory on the field of battle.

Modify Tank

During playthrough, you can freely dismantle turrets from your tank and replace it with the turrets from other vehicles.

Recruit Crews

Each student in the tank club has unique talents. Recruiting them into your crew during battles will grant your vehicle new abilities.
